name: Careful Where You Stand
content: I feel safe
我很安心
I feel warm
我很温暖
When you're here can I do no wrong
因为你在 我没有错
我被拯救 当你在侧
I'm alright I'm alright
我还好
I am safe when I am with you

And I feel warm if you want me to
我心如一 如你所愿
I am cured when I'm by your side
我被救赎 当你在侧
I'm alright
一切都好
Careful where you stand my love
让我为你开路 挚爱

让我做你依靠
It's true we're always there

一直在等待相逢
